ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi all I have a question

ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "subxero2002" <subxero2002@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 16, 2002 11:29 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Hi all I have a question


> I used to hunt in EC but once I got higher lvls I have left EC for a
> couple of months ...well I made a new character and I was hunting in
> EC and there is alot of new stuff and new drops especially NO DROP
> items and I cant find anything on these new items I have tried
> casters realm and everlore but they dont have anything on these if
> someone could E-mail me a web site to find out where to turn in these
> new NO DROP items please let me know subxero2003@.......thanks
>
The last major patch had additions of new things in the Freeport area. So
new mobs with new loot are being dropped. It is a mystery for players to
explore and solve. I'm guessing the information is not up yet because people
haven't figured it out.. Or the ones who have have not posted it at website
yet.
They MIGHT be at http://eqdb.allakhazam.com
luv,
-Su
